alert.note: Alert for Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 11:39AM CST until December 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...In Oklahoma, Texas County. In Texas, Hartley and Sherman Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Oklahoma, call 844-465-4997 for road information. In Texas, call 800-452-9292 for road information.
